ABOUT.PASSION: My goal is to actively contribute to the development of user-friendly, scalable web applications. I love helping projects grow, diving into complex requirements, and crafting robust solutions through clean, maintainable code.
ABOUT.LOCATION: Vienna, Graz or somewhere else. I am also open to all different ways of working: remote, on-site, hybrid ...
ABOUT.MINDSET: I am passionate about learning, whether it is through new technologies, teamwork, or challenges in day-to-day project work. Openness, curiosity, and forward thinking are essential parts of my professional mindset.
ABOUT.FIND_SOLUTIONS: Thanks to my interdisciplinary background, I approach challenges both analytically and creatively. I value tried-and-tested methods but remain open to unconventional paths. I don´t aim for complicated solutions, but for the right ones – ideally in collaboration with others.

SKILLS.HEADLINE: My skills
SKILLS.DESCRIPTION: My projects – a preview awaits below – showcase how I apply a variety of modern frontend technologies.
SKILLS.AMBITION: Not an issue. I'm always keen to grow and expand my skill set.

PROJECTS.SUBHEADLINE: Explore a selection of my work here. Interact with projects to see my skills in action.
PROJECTS.DESCRIPTION_JOIN: Task manager inspired by the Kanban System. Create and organize tasks using drag and drop functions, assign contacts and categories.
PROJECTS.DESCRIPTION_POKEDEX: Based on the pokéAPI a simple library that provides and catalogues pokemon information. Search in more than 1300 pokémons.
PROJECTS.DESCRIPTION_SHARKY: A 2D Jump-and-Run game based on an object-oriented approach. Help Sharky to find coins and poison bottles to fight against the killer whale and other enemies.

REFERENCES.CITATION_BASTIAN: Christina and I worked together on the 'Join' project. Her sense for clean code, design, and her attention to detail left a lasting impression on me. She is focused and noticeably strengthened our team with her solution-oriented drive. I would be happy to work with her on another project at any time.
REFERENCES.CITATION_GEORGE: Christina consistently completed her tasks on time and with great attention to detail. Thanks to her structured approach and strong team spirit, we were able to meet all deadlines and successfully complete the project. Working with her was always pleasant and productive – I can recommend her without reservation.

CONTACT.HEADLINE: Contact
CONTACT.TEXT1: But still need some frontend support to bring it to life? Then let us connect! I am a trained web developer with a strong focus on JavaScript, TypeScript, Angular & more – and a clear goal: to create real value.
CONTACT.TEXT2: Together, we will find the best way to turn your vision into reality.

FORM.NAME: Your name is required.
FORM.AGREEMENT: and agree to the processing of my data as outlined.

PP.RESPONSIBLE_TEXT: The controller within the meaning of data protection laws, in particular the EU General Data Protection Regulation (GDPR), is:
PP.HOSTING_TEXT1: I host the content of my website with the following provider:
PP.HOSTING_TEXT2: The provider is ALL-INKL.COM – Neue Medien Münnich, Owner René Münnich, Hauptstraße 68, 02742 Friedersdorf (hereinafter referred to as All-Inkl). Please refer to All-Inkl's privacy policy for further details:
PP.HOSTING_TEXT3: The use of All-Inkl is based on Art. 6(1)(f) GDPR. I have a legitimate interest in ensuring the most reliable presentation of my website possible. Where applicable consent has been obtained, processing is carried out solely on the basis of Art. 6(1)(a) GDPR and § 25(1) TDDDG, insofar as the consent includes the storage of cookies or access to information on the user's device (e.g., device fingerprinting) within the meaning of the TDDDG. Consent can be revoked at any time.
PP.RIGHTS_TEXT1: Using the contact details provided, you may exercise the following rights at any time in accordance with the EU General Data Protection Regulation (GDPR):
PP.RIGHTS_LIST1: Access to the data stored about you and information about its processing (Art. 15 GDPR),
PP.RIGHTS_LIST2: Correction of inaccurate personal data (Art. 16 GDPR),
PP.RIGHTS_LIST3: Erasure of your data stored with us (Art. 17 GDPR),
PP.RIGHTS_LIST4: Restriction of data processing if I am not yet permitted to delete your data due to legal obligations (Art. 18 GDPR),
PP.RIGHTS_LIST5: Objection to the processing of your data (Art. 21 GDPR), and
PP.RIGHTS_LIST6: Data portability, provided you have consented to the data processing or have concluded a contract with me (Art. 20 GDPR).
PP.RIGHTS_TEXT2: If you have given me your consent, you may revoke it at any time with effect for the future.
PP.RIGHTS_TEXT3: You can lodge a complaint with a supervisory authority at any time, e.g., with the authority responsible for your place of residence or the competent authority responsible for the controller.
PP.RIGHTS_TEXT4: A list of supervisory authorities (for the non-public sector) including contact details can be found at:
PP.WEBSITE_PROCESSING_TITLE: Collection of General Information When Visiting the Website
PP.PROCESSING_P1: When you access my website — that is, if you do not register or otherwise transmit information — general information is automatically collected. This information (server log files) includes the type of web browser, the operating system used, the domain name of your internet service provider, your IP address, and similar data.
PP.PROCESSING_P2: They are processed in particular for the following purposes: ensuring a smooth connection to the website.
PP.PROCESSING_P3: I do not use your data to draw conclusions about you personally. However, I reserve the right to retrospectively check server log files if there are concrete indications of unlawful use.
PP.LEGAL_BASIS_TEXT: Processing is carried out in accordance with Art. 6(1)(f) GDPR based on my legitimate interest in improving the stability and functionality of my website, as well as ensuring system security and detecting misuse.
PP.RECIPIENTS_TEXT: Recipients of the data may be technical service providers who act as processors for the operation and maintenance of my website.
PP.STORAGE_TEXT: Data is stored in server log files in a form that permits identification of the data subjects for a maximum of two months, unless a security-relevant incident occurs (e.g., a DDoS attack).
PP.STORAGE_TEXT2: In the event of such an incident, server log files will be stored until the incident is resolved and fully clarified.
PP.PROVISION_TEXT: The provision of the aforementioned personal data is neither legally nor contractually required. However, without the IP address, the functionality of my website cannot be guaranteed. Individual services and features may also be unavailable or limited.
PP.OBJECTION_TEXT: Please read the information on your right to object pursuant to Art. 21 GDPR below.
PP.CONTACT_TEXT1: There is a contact form on my website that can be used for electronic communication. If a user makes use of this option, the data entered into the input form will be transmitted to me and stored.
PP.CONTACT_TEXT2: At the time the message is sent, the following data is also stored: the URL from which the request was made.
PP.CONTACT_TEXT3: It is also possible to contact me via the provided email address(es). In this case, the personal data transmitted with the email is stored. This includes the date and time of the email, email address, IP addresses, and information about the servers involved in the email communication.
PP.CONTACT_TEXT4: You may contact me by phone using the provided number. In doing so, log data is collected, including your phone number and the duration of the call.
PP.CONTACT_TEXT5: Regardless of the communication channel used, I collect the content of your inquiry. Your data is stored for the purpose of individual communication with you.
PP.CONTACT_TEXT6: Data processing is based on a legitimate interest (Art. 6(1)(f) GDPR).
PP.CONTACT_TEXT7: My legitimate interest in processing your data is to enable straightforward communication with you.
PP.CONTACT_TEXT8: If you contact me to request an offer, data processing is carried out for the performance of pre-contractual measures (Art. 6(1)(b) GDPR).
PP.CONTACT_TEXT9: Recipients of the data may be technical service providers who act as processors for the operation and maintenance of my website.
PP.CONTACT_TEXT10: Data is deleted no later than two months after the contact request has been processed.
PP.CONTACT_TEXT11: If a contractual relationship is established, I am subject to statutory retention periods. These are generally six or ten years due to requirements of proper accounting and tax law.
PP.CONTACT_TEXT12: The provision of your personal data is voluntary. However, I can only process your request if you provide me with the necessary data and the reason for your inquiry.
PP.CONTACT_TEXT13: Please refer to the information about your right to object under Art. 21 GDPR below.
PP.SOCIAL_LINKS_TEXT: This website contains links to external profiles on social networks (LinkedIn, GitHub). By clicking on these links, you will be redirected to the respective sites. Only there may personal data be processed by the respective provider. No automatic data transfer to these providers occurs when loading this site.
PP.GOOGLE_FONTS_TITLE: Use of Script Libraries (Google Web Fonts)
PP.GOOGLE_FONTS_TEXT1: In order to display content correctly and attractively across all browsers, this website uses 'Google Web Fonts' provided by Google LLC (1600 Amphitheatre Parkway, Mountain View, CA 94043, USA; hereinafter referred to as 'Google') for font rendering.
PP.GOOGLE_FONTS_TEXT2: Further information about Google Web Fonts can be found at
PP.ART21_TITLE: Information About Your Right to Object Under Art. 21 GDPR
PP.ART21_SINGLE_CASE: Right to Object in Individual Cases
PP.ART21_TEXT1: You have the right, for reasons arising from your particular situation, to object at any time to the processing of your personal data based on Art. 6(1)(f) GDPR (data processing based on a balance of interests); this also applies to profiling based on this provision within the meaning of Art. 4(4) GDPR.
PP.ART21_TEXT2: If you object, I will no longer process your personal data unless I can demonstrate compelling legitimate grounds for the processing that override your interests, rights, and freedoms, or if the processing serves the establishment, exercise, or defense of legal claims.
PP.CHANGES_TEXT: I reserve the right to adapt this privacy policy to ensure it always complies with current legal requirements or to reflect changes to my services, e.g., when introducing new services. The new privacy policy will then apply to your next visit.
PP.QUESTIONS_TEXT: If you have any questions about data protection, please send me an email.
PP.COPYRIGHT_TEXT: This privacy policy was created with the help of activeMind AG – the experts for
